titleStmt.title: Modern reports, or, Select cases adjudged in the Courts of Kings Bench, Chancery, Common-pleas, and Exchequer since the restauration of His Majesty King Charles II collected by a careful hand.
titleStmt.author: Colquitt, Anthony.
England and Wales. Court of Chancery.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.
England and Wales. Court of Exchequer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Basset, J. Wright, R. Chiswell, and S. Heyrick,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
